# retargetedPreview(with:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a new targeted drag item preview based on an existing one, but with a new geometric target.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func retargetedPreview(with newTarget: UIDragPreviewTarget) -> UITargetedDragPreview
```

## Parameters

- **newTarget**: A new drag item preview target.

## Return Value

A new targeted drag preview.

## Discussion

You can use this method in the drop interaction delegate’s implementation of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDropInteractionDelegate/dropInteraction(_:previewForDropping:withDefault:)] method to replace the current targeted drag item preview with a different one.
